name: Transaction Fail
description: Daily number of transactions where a failure occurred.

name: Treasury Asset
description: Name of the crypto asset the treasury company is accumulating

name: Issuance
description: Newly issued tokens that are distributed to participants (such as validators, miners, or stakers) as compensation for participating in consensus.

name: Real Economic Value USD
description: Network REV (Real Economic Value) is a standardized metric that tracks blockchain value accrual generated by user activity. REV consists of both in-protocol transaction fees and out-of-protocol tips that users pay for transaction execution, so it measures the monetary demand to transact onchain.

name: Address Total
description: Total number of active addresses

name: Fee Average
description: Average of the sum of the base fee and priority fee that day in native chain token

name: Native Token Price
description: The average token price during the specified time period for the native asset of that chain.

name: Fee Average USD
description: Average of the sum of the base fee and priority fee in USD that day

name: ETH ETF Flows
description: ETF flows for Grayscale Ethereum Mini Trust ETF (ETH)

name: Transaction Fees USD
description: Total transaction fees paid converted to USD, does not include out-of-protocol tips or additional sources of revenue

name: Transaction Success
description: Daily number of successful transactions, excluding failed transactions.

name: Burn USD
description: The total amount of burned transaction fees in USD.

name: Other Fees USD
description: For Arbitrum, other fees include the fee for Timeboost, an priroty auction for access to transactions with no delay compared to 200ms delay for the chain's sequencer

name: Transaction Success
description: Daily number of successful transactions, excluding failed transactions.

name: M NAV
description: Market NAV value for that company. Calculated as enterprise value / NAV

name: Fee Median USD
description: Median of the sum of the base fee and priority fee in USD that day

name: Fee Average
description: Average of the sum of the base fee and priority fee that day in native chain token

name: Stablecoin Supply
description: Supply tracked via transfers to/from the null address, as well as distinct issuance and redemption events for supported stablecoins. Circulating supply remove supply held in bridges, token treasuries, and known mint/burn addresses.
